name: sharpneedle
short_description:
Small and simple C#/.NET 2.0 command line (console mode) application which can replace given multiple key-value pairs in a template text file to given output text file. 

These text replacements can be based on either TAGGED keys when you manually create the template file or RAW keys, when the "template file" is actually output of another program and thus likely cannot contain tagged keywords.

In addition to plain find&replace operations  Sharpneedle can extract one data from XML document (such as XHTML) with simple XPATH path expression and place the result into a template alongside possible other replacements.
summary: commandline text file tool to do find&replace
